trends: There have been 5 other sightings in Rio Linda
There were no other sightings in Rio Linda on or around May 14th 2012
divs: Sighting DetailsI was visting my friend in rio linda he was at work ,i decided to go sit in the hot tub( backache) so i went out and sat in hot leaned back and looked up at sky and there it was white ball orb!!! It just sits there motionless i couldnt zoom in with iphone after video started but had to record it... I did not move,,, a baloon would have been moving and would have poped im sure... But this orb sits for 5 minutes still as a rock,, then a plane comes in from right and it was heading toward the same direction as orb.. After the plane makes its way toward it , its gone in a blink........ Then from about same place and direction the plane was travelling 6-7 white small orbs seem to be making formation patterns following that same path form as plane theyvare way up in sky i imagine a mile higher than the plane was... They form a quik diamond pattern and ... Gone???? But i was lucky enough to be able to video this,, i dont know or have a way to zoom in,,, but it is there!!! And i have always believed we are not alone... Ive seen odd things in sky in colorado while camping. But this is a real ufo i have on video !!! Ps the dog was trying to lick water off me when i step out of hot tub so i kept saying cut it out near silly dog:) , i think about this video alot and what happend that day i hope you can zoom in
Summary: I observed an orb that sat in one place for more than 5 minutes and when a plane came towards its path it dissappeared. And a moment after 6-7 orbs in a pattern follow its path about a mile higher and vanish
